About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

My name is Nikil Bharrat and I am a software engineer. I graduated from King's College London with a 2.1 (upper second class honours) in BSc Computer Science in 2017. I have experience using Python, Java, React.js and AWS. My aim is to become a full stack software developer.

BT

Software Graduate

I am currently on a software graduate scheme with BT working in DevOps. More specifically, I am working within BT TV in a continuous delivery/integration pipeline team which utilises Amazon Web Services (Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, ECS, EC2, WAF, CloudWatch, API Gateway, SNS, SQS and more).
